decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. By efficiently drawing cards and manipulating the board with spells like Monstrous Rage and Torch the Tower, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can establish a strong defense. Monastery Swiftspear and Stormchaser's Talent provide consistent damage, while Drake Hatcher and Thundertrap Trainer offer additional threats. The mana base is carefully constructed to ensure the deck has access to the colors needed for its spells and creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing a mix of control and aggression to overwhelm the opponent. By combining powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Spyglass Siren with disruptive spells like Duress and Go for the Throat, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building its own board presence. With cards like Enduring Curiosity and Phantom Interference providing card advantage and tempo advantage, the deck can outpace the opponent and secure victory. The inclusion of Soulstone Sanctuary and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares adds additional versatility and win conditions to the deck.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mono black aggro archetype. The key strategy involves quickly building a board presence with creatures like Preacher of the Schism and Deep-Cavern Bat, while using powerful removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to control the opponent's board. The inclusion of cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Archfiend of the Dross adds additional pressure and threat to the game. The deck also includes a mix of direct damage, disruption, and card advantage to maintain tempo and pressure the opponent.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through removal spells and lockdown effects, while also slowly building up a board presence with resilient creatures. The combination of removal, control cards, and powerful creatures like Liliana of the Veil, Elenda, Saint of Dusk, and Sunpearl Kirin allows the player to dictate the pace of the game and outvalue the opponent. The addition of cards like Unholy Annex/Ritual Chamber and Hopeless Nightmare adds an extra layer of control and disruption, making it difficult for the opponent to execute their game plan.

This deck focuses on disrupting and controlling the opponent's strategy while gradually building up its own resources. By using cards like Unsummon and Ephara's Dispersal to bounce threats back to the opponent's hand, along with cards like Stock Up and Cache Grab to draw more cards, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent in the long run. Eddymurk Crab and Tolarian Terror provide additional control options, while cards like This Town Ain't Big Enough and Bushwhack offer win conditions by overwhelming the opponent. The mana base is focused on ensuring a smooth mana curve for consistent plays.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing fast and efficiently, the deck aims to deal as much damage as possible to the opponent's life total, using cards like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage to control the board and finish off the opponent. The creature lineup consists of low-cost, high-impact creatures like Magebane Lizard and Monastery Swiftspear, while also including powerful late-game threats like Emberheart Challenger and Screaming Nemesis. With a strong mix of burn and creatures, this deck aims to win the game swiftly and decisively.
